quiz.question: When was the city of Constantinople formally renamed Istanbul by Turkish authorities?
When was the Edict of Caracalla (Constitutio Antoniniana) granting Roman citizenship to many free men?
What year did the Peace of Augsburg permit rulers to choose Lutheranism or Catholicism in the Holy Roman Empire?
Which year did the Tanzimat reforms begin in the Ottoman Empire, modernizing its institutions?
What year did the Congress of Vienna conclude, reshaping Europe after the Napoleonic Wars?
What year did the Taiping Rebellion, one of the deadliest conflicts, begin in China?
When was the Treaty of Nanking signed, ending the First Opium War and ceding Hong Kong to Britain?
What year marks the official start of the Safavid dynasty in Persia under Shah Ismail I?
What year did the Library of Alexandria suffer a major destructive event often dated by historians?
In what year did the Great Mutiny (Indian Rebellion) against British rule begin?
What year did the French Revolution's Reign of Terror peak with mass executions under the Committee of Public Safety?
In what year did the Glorious Revolution depose James II and bring William and Mary to the throne?
What year did the Act of Supremacy declare the English monarch head of the Church of England?
What year did the Glorious Revolution lead to the Bill of Rights in England, shaping parliamentary sovereignty?
Which year did the Treaty of Kanagawa open Japan to American trade under Commodore Perry?
